page.title: 07TERTIARY INDUSTRY
page.content:
The service sector is dominated by shops (mainly small family businesses), a company of industrial painters and the Army Camp at Kirton Lindsey.
Shops are clustered around the Market Place of {Kirton Lindsey}and provide the basic day-to-day needs of the local population.
{J.D.Tighe & Co. }occupy premises in Kirton Lindsey. They specialise in the cleaning and painting maintenance of industrial equipment such as storage tanks and boilers.
The Army camp features in a special page ({Page 13 }).
